introduction_text:
Sangli TLC welcome you all for TLC BigBash 2024.


Event Dates: 10th February 2024 & 11th February 2024. For detailed schedule, visit https://tlcbigbash.com/schedule

﻿Event Location: Dhananjay Garden Sangli



For accommodation in Sangli, please see our recommended hotel details. https://tlcbigbash.com/hotels. We have special hotel rates for TLC members. Please check special rate card for hotel booking and their contact details from https://tlcbigbash.com/rate_chart


For all event information please visit https://tlcbigbash.com/


For any registration related queries please contact us on +91 78700 11818.
name: tlc-member-registration
success_message:
Sangli TLC welcomes you for BigBash 2024 event. We are happy to host the event for year 2024 and we are waiting for your arrival.

Explore more about sangli from https://tlcbigbash.com/aboutsangli. We request you to book your accommodation in advance to avoid last minute rush.
success_title: Thank you for registering for BigBash 2024.
